product_name: Goal Zero Sherpa 50 Solar Recharging Kit with Power Inverter
long_description: The Goal Zero Sherpa 50 Solar Recharging Kit and Power Inverter offer a versatile, go-anywhere power source that charges USB-, 12V- and AC devices such as laptops, tablets, e-readers and smartphones.
short_description: The Goal Zero Sherpa 50 Solar Recharging Kit and Power Inverter offer a versatile, go-anywhere power source that charges USB-, 12V- and AC devices such as laptops, tablets, e-readers and smartphones.
